author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/160C Fan/Gas 4. Put the salmon fillet on a lightly oiled baking tray. Drizzle over the lime juice and a little olive oil. Sprinkle with the chilli flakes and paprika and season with salt and pepper. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until cooked through. Meanwhile, heat a tablespoon of oil in a frying pan. Add the mushrooms and stir-fry for 5 minutes. Add the broccoli and stir-fry until cooked to your liking. Add the garlic and fry for 1 minute, then stir in the parsley. Serve immediately with the salmon.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz salmon fillet, skin removed,  1 lime, juice only,  olive oil, for drizzling,  ½ tsp dried chilli flakes,  1 tsp ground paprika,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  1 tbsp olive oil,  100g/3½oz button mushrooms, sliced,  100g/3½oz  broccoli, chopped,  1 garlic clove, finely chopped,  2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley, optional
